Text: Lost is an American drama series that aired on ABC from September 22, 2004 until May 23, 2010.
Triplets:<Lost
2: Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series

--------------------
Text: List of awards and nominations received by Lost:  Amongst the wins for the series are a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series, a Golden Globe Award for Best Television Series – Drama, a Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series, and a Peabody Award.
Triplets:<Primetime Emmy Award
